messages.content: Understand the context of the conversation and respond with True or False as per the rules.
history conversation: 'Aku mau cari kos di daerah Jaksel, ada rekomendasi kos murah nggak?'
Understand the context of the conversation and respond with True or False as per the rules.
history conversation: 'Aku mau pasang iklan kos nih, boleh pasang iklan di sini nggak?'
Understand the context of the conversation and respond with True or False as per the rules.
history conversation: 'Kosnya bagus, terima kasih!' Incoming human input: 'Makasih banget, aku puas nih!'
Understand the context of the conversation and respond with True or False as per the rules.
history conversation: 'Aku butuh kos, tapi belum yakin daerah mana.' Incoming human input: 'Kira-kira ada rekomendasi di Jaksel nggak?'
Understand the context of the conversation and respond with True or False as per the rules.
history conversation: 'Aku belum tahu di daerah mana cari kos.' Incoming human input: 'Mungkin aku perlu informasi lebih lanjut deh.'
